name: Natalie Rivera
who_you_serve: Coaching Curious, Rising Coaches, Launch Ready coaches, and Forever Learners seeking foundational skills, confidence building, client acquisition, and skill enhancement.
what_you_do: Transformation Academy is the only life coach training organization in the world with 60+ niche certifications and completely self-paced, done-for-you coaching programs offered at accessible prices.

business_focus: Online coaching education and certification programs for aspiring and existing coaches.
service_provided: coach certifications, business courses, personal development courses, membership programs, community access
